summary: A Bolivian immigrant working illegally as a cook in a small restaurant in Buenos Aires suffers abuse and discrimination from its customers.
cast: Freddy Flores|Rosa Sánchez|Oscar Bertea|Enrique Liporace|Marcelo Videla|Héctor Anglada|Alberto Mercado|Luis Enrique Caetano|Rodolfo Resch|Rafael Ferro|Rafael Solano|Claudio Iturrieta|Armando Doral|Evander Holyfield|Mike Tyson
title: Bolivia
